channel.title: heart of darkness
channel.itunes:author: www.botar.us
channel.description: A masterpiece of twentieth-century writing, Heart of Darkness 1902 exposes the tenuous fabric that holds civilization together and the brutal horror at the center of European colonialism. Conrads crowning achievement recounts Marlows physical and psychological journey deep into the heart of the Belgian Congo in search of the mysterious trader Kurtz.
channel.itunes:subtitle: heart of darkness by joseph conrad
channel.itunes:summary: A masterpiece of twentieth-century writing, Heart of Darkness 1902 exposes the tenuous fabric that holds civilization together and the brutal horror at the center of European colonialism. Conrads crowning achievement recounts Marlows physical and psychological journey deep into the heart of the Belgian Congo in search of the mysterious trader Kurtz.
channel.itunes:keywords: Drama, Adventure, Audio Theater, heart of darkness, joseph conrad, OTR, Old Time Radio, botar
